LanguageData.Mousekin_ArmorCuirass.label: Mousekin Cuirass
LanguageData.Mousekin_ArmorCuirass.description: A piece of medieval plate armor that protects the torso from most injuries, worn by Mousekin pikemen, crossbowmen and Mouseketeers.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ArmorPlate.label: Mousekin Plate Armor
LanguageData.Mousekin_ArmorPlate.description: A set of medieval plate armor sized for Mousekin Knights, with overlapping solid metal plates offering increased protection for its wearer.
